description: Joshua Billings 01 Mar 2010 17 Creative Commons Adapting Greek Tragedy Fiona Macintosh talks with distinguished playwright Frank McGuinness about his work in adapting Greek tragedies for modern theatre, particularly Antigone and The Medea 0:48:46 Fiona Macintosh, Frank McGuinness 28 Jan 2010
